Tucson could feel the blast marks with his hands, and the texture of the di=
storted metal where the weapons struck the doors and structures. He knew th=
at just by the feel, things must have gotten ugly.

" Hmm..  Yeah, I'd say =
this has been abandoned for quite a long time. But I wouldn't let any guard=
s down yet.  Looks can be deceiving. Guardia, Ravenchief, if you could, sin=
ce I'm visually impaired, is there any chance that there is a computer that=
 still functions that could give us any indication as to what happened here=
, and if there is, could you see if you can pull something up on it?  That =
may give us some indications as to who or what attacked this base."

He con=
tinues to investigate along with Guardia and the others.  He could still he=
ar signals coming off his sonar systems, which often meant that someone or =
something else could be lurking.  His expressions change as he picks up the=
 resounding signals.

" I know you're here...   But where?"  He exclaims to=
 himself.
